name: Kingdom of Pegaria
description:
Kingdom of Pegaria is a pachinko game with roguelite elements. Destroy evil golems, collect gold, and expand your kingdom.

How to play:

Aim with your mouse and shoot orbs on the golems coming from below. Aim for their Core to destroy them for good and collect some gold. 

The golems get closer to the surface with each of your shots, the game ends if they reach the top. 

Spend your gold to build or upgrade buildings in your kingdom and unlock new balls or passive buffs.

Each wave is randomized, so no two runs will be the same.

Jam version:

The game was made for the Palette Jam 2 hosted by Retro Indie Josh and 8 Bits to Infinity. The theme was Break and the game was limited to 8 colors of the Rampy16 palette.
